Title: The Big Bang Theory
Plot: The sitcom is centered on five characters living in Pasadena, California: roommates Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper; Penny, a waitress and aspiring actress who lives across the hall; and Leonard and Sheldon's equally geeky and socially awkward friends and co-workers, mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Raj Koothrappali. The geekiness and intellect of the four guys is contrasted for comic effect with Penny's social skills and common sense.

Episodes.Title: Unaired Pilot
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard and Sheldon encounter a young woman crying on the curb, Leonard invites her to dinner. She is abrasive, sexy, hard, and sarcastic, but she softens a little when she discovers that the guys aren't trying to get something from her.

Episodes.Title: Access All Areas
Episodes.Plot:
Celebrating the 100th episode of US sitcom The Big Bang Theory, Rick Edwards travels to the Hollywood set for an access-all-areas visit, catching up with the cast and learning everything there is to know about the show.

This behind-the-scenes special takes fans through everything from the writing of the script to the recording of the show in front of a live audience.

Episodes.Title: It All Started With A Big Bang
Episodes.Plot:
Celebrating the 100th episode of The Big Bang Theory, Rick Edwards looks back at some of the US sitcom's most hilarious and memorable scenes and talks with the cast and crew on the set in Hollywood.

The actors share their favourite moments and reveal a few secrets about the making of the show.

Episodes.Title: The Big Bran Hypothesis
Episodes.Plot: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package in an attempt to make a good impression on Penny, but when he enlists Sheldon for help, his attempt at chivalry goes terribly awry.

Episodes.Title: The Grasshopper Experiment
Episodes.Plot: Raj's parents set him up on a blind date, but just when he discovers he can talk to her, she shows interest in Sheldon.

Episodes.Title: The Peanut Reaction
Episodes.Plot: Penny wants to throw a surprise party for Leonard, but Sheldon's indulgence at an electronics store throws her off-track.

Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Plot: Brilliant physicist roommates Leonard and Sheldon meet their new neighbor Penny, who begins showing them that as much as they know about science, they know little about actual living.

Episodes.Title: The Nerdvana Annihilation
Episodes.Plot: When delivery of another collectible leads to Penny's lashing out at Leonard, he decides it's time to give up his habit, much to his friends' protestation.

Episodes.Title: The Loobenfeld Decay
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Sheldon each lie to avoid seeing Penny's concert, but Sheldon's is a bit too complicated for his own good.

Episodes.Title: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
Episodes.Plot: With his friends knowing how sour he acts when sick—and avoiding him as a result—Sheldon is nursed by Penny, who hasn't a clue what she's in for.

Episodes.Title: The Bat Jar Conjecture
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon finds himself booted from the gang's Physics Bowl team and replaced with Leslie, so he forms his own team, hoping to prove he's superior.

Episodes.Title: The Tangerine Factor
Episodes.Plot: Penny's break-up spurs Leonard to summon the courage to ask her out, and each goes to Sheldon for advice on their upcoming date.

Episodes.Title: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
Episodes.Plot: The rest of the gang fall for Sheldon's twin sister, and Leonard's plan to win her heart is derailed when Sheldon declares he'll be the one to decide who can date her.

Episodes.Title: The Jerusalem Duality
Episodes.Plot: With Sheldon rattled over meeting Dennis, a 15-year-old physicist who's smarter than he, Leonard helps him look for a way to debunk Dennis's research.

Episodes.Title: The Middle-Earth Paradigm
Episodes.Plot: Penny hosts a Halloween party, putting Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali through a new test of their social skills.

Episodes.Title: The Luminous Fish Effect
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's getting fired forces him to explore what life has to offer outside physics, leaving Leonard to take drastic action to snap his friend out of his funk.

Episodes.Title: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization
Episodes.Plot: When they're invited to present at a physics conference, Sheldon's reluctance to share the credit leads to a tiff between him and Leonard, and Penny's intervention only exacerbates the situation.

Episodes.Title: The Hamburger Postulate
Episodes.Plot: Fearing he's wasting his time on Penny, Leonard ends up making a connection with Leslie.

Episodes.Title: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
Episodes.Plot: Leonard asks a woman out after he finds out that Penny is seeing someone.

Episodes.Title: The Dumpling Paradox
Episodes.Plot: With Wolowitz AWOL with one of her friends, Penny's recruited to fill in for him on the guys' Halo team

Episodes.Title: The Griffin Equivalency
Episodes.Plot: Raj gets an inflated ego and makes a play for Penny after being referenced in a magazine article.

Episodes.Title: The Vegas Renormalization
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Koothrappali escort a heartbroken Wolowitz to Las Vegas, and Sheldon becomes locked out of his apartment and must stay with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Terminator Decoupling
Episodes.Plot: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz are ecstatic to learn that a famous science-fiction actress (Summer Glau) is on board the train they are taking to San Francisco.

Episodes.Title: The White Asparagus Triangulation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon is thrilled when Leonard starts dating a woman who meets Sheldon's stringent standards.

Episodes.Title: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition
Episodes.Plot: Penny squares off with a new beautiful female neighbor who may become the building's "new Penny."

Episodes.Title: The Vartabedian Conundrum
Episodes.Plot: Leonard asks Penny for advice when his new relationship starts moving too fast.

Episodes.Title: The Monopolar Expedition
Episodes.Plot: The guys' plan to work over the summer at the North Pole makes Penny revaluate her feelings for Leonard.

Episodes.Title: The Panty Piñata Polarization
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon bans Penny from the apartment for numerous minor infractions, she decides to retaliate.

Episodes.Title: The Classified Materials Turbulence
Episodes.Plot: Penny's second date with Stuart sees her making a comment that gives Leonard new hope for a relationship with her. Wolowitz realizes there's a crucial error in a NASA project he's working on.

Episodes.Title: The Cushion Saturation
Episodes.Plot: A paintball game leads to a fight between Sheldon and Penny, and romance for Leslie and Wolowitz.

Episodes.Title: The Euclid Alternative
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to force Sheldon to face his fear of driving.

Episodes.Title: The Killer Robot Instability
Episodes.Plot: Penny's criticism of Wolowitz's romantic life pushes him into depression and AWOL for a fighting robot battle the rest of guys are depending on him for.

Episodes.Title: The Codpiece Topology
Episodes.Plot: A jealous Leonard reacts to Penny's new guy by rebounding with Leslie.

Episodes.Title: The Work Song Nanocluster
Episodes.Plot: Penny's home business turns into a complete nightmare when Sheldon takes over.

Episodes.Title: The Hofstadter Isotope
Episodes.Plot: A fellow comic book enthusiast's hitting on Penny leads to Leonard and Howard going to a bar's Ladies' Night.

Episodes.Title: The Maternal Capacitance
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny are drawn together after a disastrous visit from Leonard's mother.

Episodes.Title: The Barbarian Sublimation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon creates a monster when he introduces Penny to online gaming.

Episodes.Title: The Bad Fish Paradigm
Episodes.Plot: Penny's first date with Leonard goes awry; Penny finds Sheldon to be an unwilling confidant.

Episodes.Title: The Lizard-Spock Expansion
Episodes.Plot: Leonard inadvertently steals away the new woman Wolowitz thinks is the love of his life.

Episodes.Title: The Friendship Algorithm
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon creates a scientific procedure for making friends.

Episodes.Title: The Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and the gang are confused when a young grad student is attracted to him.

Episodes.Title: The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis
Episodes.Plot: Penny starts dating Leonard's handsome colleague; Leonard and his friends are tortured by Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette.

Episodes.Title: The Financial Permeability
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's solution to Penny's financial difficulty leads to a confrontation between Leonard and Penny's ex-boyfriend.

Episodes.Title: The Spaghetti Catalyst
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard and Penny aren't speaking, Sheldon goes to extremes to keep them both happy.

Episodes.Title: The Pirate Solution
Episodes.Plot: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India, but Sheldon has a solution, which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as a third wheel.

Episodes.Title: The Einstein Approximation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's search for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Gorilla Experiment
Episodes.Plot: Penny gets help from Sheldon in order to understand what Leonard's work is, while Wolowitz develops a jealousy when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: The Lunar Excitation
Episodes.Plot: While Penny worries that dating Leonard has ruined her for normal guys, Wolowitz and Koothrappali search for Sheldon's perfect match online.

Episodes.Title: The Adhesive Duck Deficiency
Episodes.Plot: With Leonard, Howard and Raj away camping in the desert, an injured Penny has only Sheldon to rely on.

Episodes.Title: The Excelsior Acquisition
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon winds up in traffic court when he gets a ticket because of Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Gothowitz Deviation
Episodes.Plot: Howard and Raj visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

Episodes.Title: The Wheaton Recurrence
Episodes.Plot: A fight between Leonard and Penny threatens their relationship, while Sheldon battles Wil Wheaton in bowling.

Episodes.Title: The Maternal Congruence
Episodes.Plot: A Christmas visit from his mother has Leonard discovering she's kept a lot of news from him that she shares with Sheldon and worrying if she'll approve of his romance with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon learns the guys tampered with his expedition data he got from the arctic, he leaves to Texas in disgrace. This results in the guys following him, which threatens Leonard's hope for some romantic time with Penny and the guys' friendship with Sheldon.

Episodes.Title: The Pants Alternative
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's friends come to his aid when his fear of public speaking stands between him and a coveted award.

Episodes.Title: The Large Hadron Collision
Episodes.Plot: Leonard can only bring one guest on a trip to see CERN's Large Hadron Collider (the world's largest and highest energy particle accelerator) in Switzerland on Valentine's Day.

Episodes.Title: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary
Episodes.Plot: After overhearing that Wil Wheaton is entering a trading-card competition, Sheldon decides to enter it himself. Meanwhile, Penny sets up one of her friends on a date with Wolowitz.

Episodes.Title: The Guitarist Amplification
Episodes.Plot: A squabble between Leonard and Penny sees Sheldon playing mediator, though out of his own incovenience from the sitiation rather than altruism.

Episodes.Title: The Jiminy Conjecture
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup while Sheldon and Howard stake their best comic books on a bet to determine the species of a cricket.

Episodes.Title: The Precious Fragmentation
Episodes.Plot: When the guys find a ring from "The Lord of the Rings" at a garage sale, it threatens to tear them apart.

Episodes.Title: The Staircase Implementation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard tells Penny about how he met Sheldon for the first time...and what happened to the elevator.

Episodes.Title: The Vengeance Formulation
Episodes.Plot: After he's humiliated on National Public Radio, Sheldon vows to destroy Kripke, while Wolowitz tries not to destroy his new relationship with Bernadette.

Episodes.Title: The Psychic Vortex
Episodes.Plot: Leonard is aghast to find out a secret of Penny's: she believes in psychics. Meanwhile, Sheldon tries to assist Koothrappali in picking up a girl at a university mixer.

Episodes.Title: The Cornhusker Vortex
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon becomes Leonard's teacher in order to understand football, while an incident with flying a kite threatens Howard and Raj's friendship.

Episodes.Title: The Plimpton Stimulation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Sheldon compete for the attention of a famous female physicist.

Episodes.Title: The Bozeman Reaction
Episodes.Plot: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system.

Episodes.Title: The Robotic Manipulation
Episodes.Plot: Penny tags along on Sheldon's first ever date; Wolowitz finds a new use for a robotic arm.

Episodes.Title: The Love Car Displacement
Episodes.Plot: Bernadette runs into her ex-boyfriend while attending a science event with Wolowitz.

Episodes.Title: The Agreement Dissection
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard spends too much time in the shower with Priya, Sheldon charges Leonard with two violations of the roommate agreement. However, before he can get too far, Priya uses her skills as a lawyer to nullify the charges due to the agreement's vague wording, much to Sheldon's dismay. When the guys take advantage of Priya's skills in order to eat Greek food on pizza night, Sheldon goes to Penny, who invites him to a girls' night out with Amy and Bernadette, which Sheldon agrees to after Penny mentions that they may be talking trash about Priya. After the girls drink some cocktails, they decide to take Sheldon dancing, which Sheldon reluctantly goes along with. After dancing, Sheldon takes an intoxicated Amy back to her apartment and as well as talking about Priya, meets a monkey who is addicted to smoking cigarettes. Amy tells Sheldon not to give in to Priya's law skills, before kissing him and going to her bathroom to vomit.

Episodes.Title: The Desperation Emanation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard realizes he’s the only one without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his.

Episodes.Title: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis
Episodes.Plot: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Penny's ex, while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.

Episodes.Title: The Herb Garden Germination
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Amy decide to start several rumors about the others as a test. Meanwhile, Howard takes his relationship with Bernadette to even higher level.

Episodes.Title: The Engagement Reaction
Episodes.Plot: When Howard finally breaks the news to his mom that he's engaged to Bernadette, it lands her in the hospital.

Episodes.Title: The Apology Insufficiency
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's answers during an FBI interview put Wolowitz's security clearance in jeopardy.

Episodes.Title: The Wildebeest Implementation
Episodes.Plot: Raj attempts to cure his social anxiety disorder while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: The 21-second Excitation
Episodes.Plot: While the guys camp in line for a long-awaited movie screening, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

Episodes.Title: The Toast Derivation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon becomes concerned when everybody begins to hang out at Raj's apartment and discovers Leonard is the center of the group.

Episodes.Title: The Cohabitation Formulation
Episodes.Plot: As Wolowitz contemplates taking things with Bernadette to the next level, Leonard rekindles his relationship with Raj's sister.

Episodes.Title: The Irish Pub Formulation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard keeps an affair a secret from Sheldon, Howard and Raj.

Episodes.Title: The Hot Troll Deviation
Episodes.Plot: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitz's comes to light, while Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

Episodes.Title: The Bus Pants Utilization
Episodes.Plot: Leonard's idea for a smartphone app derails his friendship with Sheldon.

Episodes.Title: The Benefactor Factor
Episodes.Plot: A wealthy donor to the university makes Leonard consider how far he's willing to go for the sake of science.

Episodes.Title: The Prestidigitation Approximation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon is baffled by Wolowitz's magic trick. Meanwhile, Leonard realizes dating Priya may make it impossible to continue being friends with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Thespian Catalyst
Episodes.Plot: Hoping it will make him a better teacher, Sheldon has Penny give him acting lessons. Raj has fantasies about a friend's girlfriend.

Episodes.Title: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification
Episodes.Plot: Realizing he will not live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, Sheldon tries to extend his life span.

Episodes.Title: The Shiny Trinket Maneuver
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy when he isn't impressed by her recent accomplishment, and Howard must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

Episodes.Title: The Beta Test Initiation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny deal with the idea of starting a relationship again and Raj finally finds a "woman" he can talk to without being drunk, in the form of Siri on his new phone. Meanwhile, Sheldon decides to start a YouTube series entitled "Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags" with the help of Amy.

Episodes.Title: The Hawking Excitation
Episodes.Plot: When Wolowitz gets to work with Stephen Hawking, Sheldon is willing to do anything to meet his hero.

Episodes.Title: The Good Guy Fluctuation
Episodes.Plot: A cute comic book artist puts Leonard and Priya’s relationship to the test, while Sheldon tries to scare the guys for Halloween.

Episodes.Title: The Countdown Reflection
Episodes.Plot: The fifth season ends with Howard and Bernadette deciding to get married before his NASA mission, causing the gang to scurry into overdrive in an effort to stage the wedding. NASA astronaut Mike Massimino has a cameo as himself.

Episodes.Title: The Vacation Solution
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon is forced to take his vacation, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.

Episodes.Title: The Werewolf Transformation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon becomes agitated when his regular barber is out sick. Astronaut training causes Howard to reconsider wanting to go into space. Penny beats Leonard in chess, the first time she plays.

Episodes.Title: The Weekend Vortex
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon must choose between joining Amy at her aunt's birthday party or playing videogames all weekend with the guys.

Episodes.Title: The Launch Acceleration
Episodes.Plot: When NASA moves up Howard's mission, he must face his fears and Bernadette's dad, thus putting the wedding plans in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Leonard says something surprising to Penny in the bedroom.

Episodes.Title: The Stag Convergence
Episodes.Plot: After the guys throw Howard a bachelor party, Bernadette reconsiders marrying him after learning about his sexual history.

Episodes.Title: The Transporter Malfunction
Episodes.Plot: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon “Star Trek” collectibles as a thank-you, leading Sheldon to be haunted by Mr. Spock. Meanwhile, Raj decides he has met the “Future Mrs. Koothrappali” after his parents set him up on a date.

Episodes.Title: The Speckerman Recurrence
Episodes.Plot: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor.

Episodes.Title: The Rothman Disintegration
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon battles Kripke for a coveted office at the university. Penny receives a very unusual gift from Amy.

Episodes.Title: The Isolation Permutation
Episodes.Plot: Amy becomes heartbroken when she discovers that Penny and Bernadette went wedding dress shopping without her.

Episodes.Title: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst
Episodes.Plot: Penny plays Matchmaker for Raj, which results in him finding a girl he is comfortable talking to.

Episodes.Title: The Russian Rocket Reaction
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a party at Wil Wheaton's house, and Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity.

Episodes.Title: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Amy get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz.

Episodes.Title: The Ornithophobia Diffusion
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny try hanging out as friends on a 'non-date', but end up purposely ruining each others chances with perspective dates. Meanwhile, Sheldon enlists the help of Bernadette and Amy to overcome his fear of birds.

Episodes.Title: The Friendship Contraction
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's selfish demands force Leonard to reconsider their friendship. Meanwhile, Wolowitz tries to pick his astronaut nickname.

Episodes.Title: The Recombination Hypothesis
Episodes.Plot: Leonard, who broke up with Priya, asks Penny out to a spur-of the-moment romantic dinner for two, and the duo contemplates on their relationship.

Episodes.Title: The Skank Reflex Analysis
Episodes.Plot: Penny is worried with how damaged her friendship with the guys will be in the aftermath of her sleeping with Raj while Sheldon becomes the leader of the paintball team.

Episodes.Title: The Rhinitis Revelation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's mother, Mary Cooper, comes to visit, but Sheldon is annoyed that she also spends time with the rest of the gang, instead of catering to his every demand.

Episodes.Title: The Flaming Spittoon Acquisition
Episodes.Plot: When Stuart asks Amy out on a date, Sheldon must confront his feelings and consider where his relationship with Amy is going.

Episodes.Title: The Infestation Hypothesis
Episodes.Plot: A fight between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya.

Episodes.Title: The Proton Resurgence
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Sheldon hire the host (Bob Newhart) of their favorite childhood TV show to perform; Bernadette and Howard run into trouble while dog-sitting for Raj's pet.

Episodes.Title: The Re-Entry Minimization
Episodes.Plot: When Wolowitz returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

Episodes.Title: The Extract Obliteration
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon’s relationship with Stephen Hawking is threatened over a game of “Words with Friends,” and Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

Episodes.Title: The Tenure Turbulence
Episodes.Plot: The girls get involved when Leonard, Sheldon and Raj compete for tenure at the University.

Episodes.Title: The Bon Voyage Reaction
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard receives an exciting opportunity to work overseas, Penny and Sheldon are thrown for a loop.

Episodes.Title: The Egg Salad Equivalency
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment, he ends up getting Raj, Leonard and Wolowitz in trouble.

Episodes.Title: The Holographic Excitation
Episodes.Plot: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart’s comic book store. Meanwhile, Leonard seduces Penny with science.

Episodes.Title: The 43 Peculiarity
Episodes.Plot: Raj and Howard try to to figure out why Sheldon disappears at 2:45 every afternoon; jealousy arises in Penny and Leonard's relationship.

Episodes.Title: The Monster Isolation
Episodes.Plot: After a bad date, Koothrappali decides to never leave his apartment; Penny's acting skills impress Sheldon.

Episodes.Title: The Habitation Configuration
Episodes.Plot: Wolowitz struggles with moving out of his mother’s house. Meanwhile, Sheldon is caught in the middle of an argument between Amy and Wil Wheaton.

Episodes.Title: The Santa Simulation
Episodes.Plot: During a game, Sheldon revisits Christmas memories; Amy, Penny and Bernadette look for a date for Koothrappali.

Episodes.Title: The Fish Guts Displacement
Episodes.Plot: When Amy gets sick, Sheldon tries to nurse her back to health; Wolowitz and his father-in-law plan a fishing trip.

Episodes.Title: The Parking Spot Escalation
Episodes.Plot: When the University reassigns Sheldon’s parking spot to Wolowitz, their fight affects the whole gang.

Episodes.Title: The Bakersfield Expedition
Episodes.Plot: As the guys don costumes and go on a road trip to a comic book convention, the ladies decide to stay home and try to interpret a comic book.

Episodes.Title: The Closure Alternative
Episodes.Plot: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his compulsive need for closure when one of his favorite TV shows is canceled; Raj discovers a secret about Lucy.

Episodes.Title: The Tangible Affection Proof
Episodes.Plot: The guys search for a perfect Valentine's Day gift for their significant others; Stuart and Raj host a "lonely people" party at the comic book store.

Episodes.Title: The Higgs Boson Observation
Episodes.Plot: Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, and the pressure of being in space takes its toll on Wolowitz.

Episodes.Title: The Spoiler Alert Segmentation
Episodes.Plot: A fight between Sheldon and Leonard impacts Amy and Penny's living arrangements; while Howard is away, Raj helps Mrs. Wolowitz out.

Episodes.Title: The Decoupling Fluctuation
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard, he tries to intervene. Meanwhile, in space, the other astronauts pick on Howard.

Episodes.Title: The Contractual Obligation Implementation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz talk to junior high girls about science-related careers; Raj plans a date with Lucy.

Episodes.Title: The Closet Reconfiguration
Episodes.Plot: Howard considers whether or not he should open a letter from his father; Penny and Leonard host a "grown-up" cocktail party.

Episodes.Title: The Cooper/Kripke Inversion
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon faces a crisis of confidence when he is forced to work with his nemesis, Barry Kripke; Raj and Howard buy expensive action figures of themselves.

Episodes.Title: The Date Night Variable
Episodes.Plot: With his friends on dates, Raj must face his loneliness. Also, Wolowitz is caught in an argument between Bernadette and his mom, even while he’s in space

Episodes.Title: The Mommy Observation
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon visits his Mom in Houston, he is forced to confront a new reality. Meanwhile, Raj’s ‘Murder Mystery’ party starts some fights within the gang.

Episodes.Title: The Indecision Amalgamation
Episodes.Plot: While Raj is wracked with guilt when he tries to date two women at once, Penny wrestles with whether to take a role in a cheesy movie and Sheldon is torn trying to choose between two gaming systems.

Episodes.Title: The Proton Displacement
Episodes.Plot: When Professor Proton asks Leonard for help with an experiment, Sheldon retaliates by befriending Proton's rival, Bill Nye.

Episodes.Title: The Deception Verification
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Sheldon's friendship is tested; Wolowitz's relationship with his mom causes a threat to his masculinity.

Episodes.Title: The Occupation Recalibration
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a vacation. Meanwhile, Leonard struggles to be supportive of Penny after she quits her job, and Bernadette seeks Stuart’s help in replacing one of Howard’s comic books.

Episodes.Title: The Scavenger Vortex
Episodes.Plot: When the entire gang competes in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj, it brings out the best - and worst - in everyone.

Episodes.Title: The Raiders Minimization
Episodes.Plot: Beverly Hofstadter writes a psychology book about Leonard which Penny buys and reads. Sheldon wants to ruin something for Amy after she ruins an Indiana Jones movie for him. Raj and Stuart try online dating.

Episodes.Title: The Relationship Diremption
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon faces a personal crisis after deciding he’s wasting his time with string theory. Meanwhile, a double date between Raj, Emily and the Wolowitzes ends in embarrassment for Howard.

Episodes.Title: The Proton Transmogrification
Episodes.Plot: As the gang celebrates Star Wars Day, Sheldon discovers he is having difficulty dealing with the death of Professor Proton.

Episodes.Title: The Discovery Dissipation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Amy help Sheldon cope with the shame he’s feeling after his accidental contribution to science is disproved.  Meanwhile, Raj must stay with Howard and Bernadette for a week.

Episodes.Title: The Locomotive Manipulation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Amy go on a trip to wine country with Howard and Bernadette; Penny and Leonard rush Raj's dog to the vet.

Episodes.Title: The Romance Resonance
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon's latest scientific breakthrough leaves him feeling like a fraud; a romantic gesture between Howard and Bernadette causes Penny to up her game with Leonard.

Episodes.Title: The Hesitation Ramification
Episodes.Plot: When Penny’s big acting break on NCIS is a bust, Leonard struggles to help her, which results in Penny asking Leonard a bold relationship question.  Meanwhile, Sheldon tries to learn how to be funny and Raj tries to work on his “game” before talking to girls.

Episodes.Title: The Gorilla Dissolution
Episodes.Plot: A bad day causes Penny to reevaluate her life choices – including Leonard. Meanwhile, Howard and Bernadette struggle to care for Mrs. Wolowitz, and Raj gets relationship advice from Sheldon.

Episodes.Title: The Table Polarization
Episodes.Plot: Leonard buys a dining room table and it causes Sheldon to reevaluate the changes in his life. Meanwhile, Wolowitz is offered a chance to go back to space and Bernadette struggles with whether or not to encourage him.

Episodes.Title: The Convention Conundrum
Episodes.Plot: After the guys can’t get Comic-Con tickets, Sheldon tries to hold his own convention and winds up spending a wild night with James Earl Jones. Meanwhile, the girls see if they can act like “grown-ups”.

Episodes.Title: The Cooper Extraction
Episodes.Plot: While Sheldon is in Texas, the rest of the gang realizes how much he has changed their lives as they decorate the apartment Christmas tree.

Episodes.Title: The Status Quo Combustion
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon get upset about his career, the destruction of the comic book store and Leonard and Penny's future living arrangements. Howard and Bernadette can't keep hold of a caretaker for his mother. With his entire world changing around him, Sheldon considers a major move.

Episodes.Title: The Friendship Turbulence
Episodes.Plot: Bernadette tries to negotiate peace between Sheldon and Wolowitz; Penny receives an embarrassing offer; Raj wants Amy to write to a woman on his behalf.

Episodes.Title: The Workplace Proximity
Episodes.Plot: Amy starts working at Caltech which causes friction with Sheldon. Howard agrees with Sheldon who mentions this to Bernadette causing a big fight for the Wolowitzes.

Episodes.Title: The Locomotion Interruption
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Amy make an unexpected trip to Arizona to fetch Sheldon; Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company; Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz disturbs Howard.

Episodes.Title: The Skywalker Incursion
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard and Sheldon are invited to speak at UC Berkeley, they take a detour to try to meet an idol. Also, when Bernadette and Howard battle over the fate of his Doctor Who TARDIS, Raj and Amy offer to settle the dispute with a game of ping pong.

Episodes.Title: The Clean Room Infiltration
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Howard turn to Raj for help in dealing with a work emergency when they nearly come to blows after blaming each other for a potential disaster at the university. Amy throws an authentic Victorian Christmas party, while Sheldon seeks revenge on her for making him celebrate the holidays.

Episodes.Title: The Troll Manifestation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Sheldon publish a paper which is widely accepted except for comments from an internet troll. Meanwhile, the girls reminisce about embarrassing incidents from their past.

Episodes.Title: The Colonization Application
Episodes.Plot: Trouble arises when Amy learns Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonize Mars. Also, a trip to the pet store ends in a fight for Sheldon and Amy, Leonard surprises Penny with a very “adult” purchase, and Raj is caught snooping in Emily’s apartment.

Episodes.Title: The Intimacy Acceleration
Episodes.Plot: As a joke, Sheldon and Penny try an experiment designed to make participants fall in love.  Also, Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape a room with a “zombie.” And, after returning from Mrs. Wolowitz’ funeral, Bernadette and Howard run into trouble at the airport.

Episodes.Title: The Focus Attenuation
Episodes.Plot: During their weekend in Las Vegas, Bernadette and Amy accuse Penny of being a buzz kill. The guys try to invent the next big thing.

Episodes.Title: The Septum Deviation
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard gets minor surgery on his nose, Sheldon is the one in need of sympathy. Meanwhile, Raj's parents' impending divorce causes Howard and Bernadette to work on their own marriage.

Episodes.Title: The Champagne Reflection
Episodes.Plot: While Sheldon says a tearful goodbye to the final installment of "Fun with Flags", Leonard, Howard and Raj search for something significant in a dead professor's research. And Bernadette is shocked to learn of her co-workers’ true feelings from Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Commitment Determination
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon pushes Leonard and Penny to choose a date for their wedding and deals with dramatic changes in his own relationship with Amy.

Episodes.Title: The Prom Equivalency
Episodes.Plot: When the gang recreates a high-school prom night on the roof of the guys'; apartment building, Sheldon feels pressure to participate in all the typical romantic traditions.

Episodes.Title: The Maternal Combustion
Episodes.Plot: Personalities collide when Sheldon and Leonard’s mothers finally meet. Meanwhile, Howard finally decides to “man up” and do his fair share of the housework – but not without a little help from his friends.

Episodes.Title: The Fortification Implementation
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon and Amy build a blanket fort, they come to major crossroads in their relationship. Also, Wolowitz meets the half-brother he never knew he had, and when Penny is invited to appear on Wil Wheaton’s podcast, she and Leonard have a huge, on-air argument.

Episodes.Title: The Communication Deterioration
Episodes.Plot: When Raj is asked to create a message in case a NASA mission discovers alien life, the guys fight over what he should do. Also, Penny is torn between auditioning for a movie or keeping her successful pharmaceutical sales job.

Episodes.Title: The Anxiety Optimization
Episodes.Plot: The gang tries to help Sheldon when he becomes stuck in a rut at work by increasing his anxiety level. Howard teases Raj with a new game called "Cinnamon or Emily?"

Episodes.Title: The Misinterpretation Agitation
Episodes.Plot: The guys try to help Penny out of an awkward work dilemma, when a smitten doctor shows up at her door after her flirtatious sales techniques work a little too well. Meanwhile, Amy and Bernadette argue over whether or not female scientists should play up their sexuality.

Episodes.Title: The Junior Professor Solution
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon must teach a class, Howard decides to take it. Amy takes advantage of the tension between Penny and Bernadette.

Episodes.Title: The First Pitch Insufficiency
Episodes.Plot: Wolowitz feels nervous when he is asked to throw the first pitch at a Los Angeles Angels game. Penny and Leonard want to prove Sheldon wrong after he says he and Amy are the better couple.

Episodes.Title: The Hook-Up Reverberation
Episodes.Plot: Raj's honesty comes back to haunt him when his new girlfriend is unfriendly to Penny. The guys think about becoming part owners in Stuart's store.

Episodes.Title: The Leftover Thermalization
Episodes.Plot: Friction ensues when a magazine fails to mention Leonard in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Also, a blackout at Mrs. Wolowitz’s home leads to a final family dinner in her honor.

Episodes.Title: The Comic Book Store Regeneration
Episodes.Plot: Wolowitz receives some shocking news as everyone prepares for the reopening of Stuart’s comic book store. Penny teaches Sheldon how to “let it go,” but can’t follow her own advice after she learns something infuriating about Amy. Also, Leonard and Raj think they spot Nathan Fillion at a restaurant.

Episodes.Title: The 2003 Approximation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon learns of an impending change in his living arrangements and decides to revert back to 2003, a simpler time before he met Leonard and Penny. Also, Howard and Raj form a band to play at the Comic Book Store.

Episodes.Title: The Helium Insufficiency
Episodes.Plot: In the midst of a nation-wide helium shortage, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to get the supplies they need. Also, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app on Amy's phone to try and find her a new man.

Episodes.Title: The Locomotion Reverberation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Wolowitz try to distract Sheldon when he slows the progress of their guidance system. Also, Penny and Amy take Bernadette out for the night, leaving Raj and Stuart to care for baby Halley.

Episodes.Title: The Recollection Dissipation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on projects with Leonard and Wolowitz as well as Amy on the same day. Also, Bernadette is nearing the end of her maternity leave and must return to work.

Episodes.Title: The Solo Oscillation
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon kicks Amy out to work solo, she and Leonard bond during a series of science experiments. Also, Bert the geologist replaces Wolowitz in the band Footprints on the Moon, and Sheldon finds Penny a surprising source of scientific inspiration.

Episodes.Title: The Reclusive Potential
Episodes.Plot: A brilliant but reclusive scientist, Doctor Wolcott, invites Sheldon to his cabin in the middle of nowhere, and Leonard, Raj and Howard go along for the trip. Also, Penny and Bernadette improvise after Amy doesn’t like the tame bachelorette party they planned for her.

Episodes.Title: The Tesla Recoil
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Wolowitz are furious after they learn Sheldon went to work with the military behind their backs. Also, while Bernadette is on bed rest, she asks Raj to do some digging when she suspects Ruchi is trying to steal her job.

Episodes.Title: The Confirmation Polarization
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Amy are thrilled when their super asymmetry theory is proven by two physicists, until they try to kick Amy off the Nobel nomination; Bernadette has a big success at work.

Episodes.Title: The Grant Allocation Derivation
Episodes.Plot: Leonard is caught between a rock and a hard place when he's responsible for distributing extra grant money. Bernadette turns the backyard playhouse into a hideaway from Howard and the kids.

Episodes.Title: The Inspiration Deprivation
Episodes.Plot: The concept of what it would mean for women everywhere if Amy were to win a Nobel Prize causes Amy to have a meltdown. Also, Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to relive the good old days after Wolowitz buys a scooter that looks like the one he had years ago.

Episodes.Title: The Meteorite Manifestation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon is thrilled to help Bernadette and Wolowitz navigate bureaucratic paperwork, until he discovers they are breaking the law. Also, Leonard is disappointed when his friends exclude him from a scientific project.

Episodes.Title: The Conjugal Configuration
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Amy's honeymoon runs aground in New York. Penny and Leonard discover they are uncomfortably similar to Amy's parents. Raj insults physicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and starts a Twitter war.

Episodes.Title: The VCR Illumination
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon and Amy are still down about their theory being disproven, but a VHS tape from Sheldon’s past inspires him not to give up. Bernadette turns into a pageant mom when she tries to help Howard ace his Magic Castle audition.

Episodes.Title: The Paintball Scattering
Episodes.Plot: Penny and Leonard organize a paintball game that results in mayhem when Sheldon is jealous of Amy. Also, Koothrappali catches Anu with her ex-boyfriend, and Stuart doesn’t want to move in with Denise.

Episodes.Title: The Tam Turbulence
Episodes.Plot: When Sheldon won't tell anyone why he's never mentioned his childhood best friend, Leonard takes matters into his own hands. Bernadette and Penny take out Raj’s fiancée for dinner to get the skinny on her.

Episodes.Title: The Consummation Deviation
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon tries to bond with Amy's father, but when Howard lures Mr. Fowler away with magic tricks, Sheldon has no choice but to bond with Mrs. Fowler. Raj and Anu try to get physical for the first time.

Episodes.Title: The Procreation Calculation
Episodes.Plot: The Wolowitzes' life gets complicated when Stuart starts bringing his new girlfriend home. Penny and Leonard talk about starting a family. Raj explores an arranged marriage.

Episodes.Title: The Conference Valuation
Episodes.Plot: When Penny and Bernadette go to San Diego for a pharmaceutical sales convention, Wolowitz is in charge of the kids. Also, Sheldon finds a book on experimenting on kids, and the guys plus Amy make a day of it.

Episodes.Title: The Donation Oscillation
Episodes.Plot: Penny tries to seduce an abstaining Leonard to ruin his "donation" for her ex-boyfriend, Zack, and his wife, Marissa. Also, Wolowitz, Bernadette, Anu and Koothrappali turn Koothrappali's canceled bachelor party into a couple's trip.
